# Bangkok – 7 Days Relaxing Holiday  
**Dates:** 2025-07-17 → 2025-07-24  **Travellers:** 2

## Overview
- Explore the majestic Grand Palace and Wat Phra Kaew
- Relax at Lumphini Park and enjoy nature
- Shop and dine at the famous Chatuchak Weekend Market
- Experience the rich culture at Jim Thompson House
- Scenic cruise along the Chao Phraya River

Accommodation: *Prime location in Old Town, Fast WiFi, 50 SQM*, [link](https://www.airbnb.com/rooms/1428007797034678318)

---

### Day 1 – Thursday 17 Jul
**Morning**  
- Arrive in Bangkok. Check-in at your Airbnb.

**Afternoon**  
- Rest and explore local eateries nearby.

**Evening**  
- Visit a local market for dinner.

---

### Day 2 – Friday 18 Jul
**Morning**  
- **Visit Grand Palace**  
  Explore the majestic Grand Palace and Wat Phra Kaew. Entry fee: ~500 THB.  
  [More info here](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Grand_Palace)

**Afternoon**  
- **Relax at Lumphini Park**  
  Enjoy a relaxing afternoon. Rent a paddle boat or have a picnic.  
  [More info here](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lumphini_Park)

**Evening**  
- Dinner at a local restaurant.

---

### Day 3 – Saturday 19 Jul
**Morning**  
- **Explore Chatuchak Weekend Market**  
  Shop for souvenirs and savor street food.   
  [More info here](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Chatuchak_Weekend_Market)

**Afternoon**  
- Continue exploring the market.

**Evening**  
- **Dinner at a rooftop restaurant**  
  Enjoy magnificent views of the Bangkok skyline.

---

### Day 4 – Sunday 20 Jul
**Morning**  
- **Visit Jim Thompson House**  
  Explore the traditional Thai house and learn about silk weaving. Entry fee: ~200 THB.  
  [More info here](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Jim_Thompson_House)

**Afternoon**  
- **Cruise on Chao Phraya River**  
  Enjoy a scenic boat ride. Book in advance.  
  [More info here](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Chao_Phraya)

**Evening**  
- Dinner and free time.

---

### Day 5 – Monday 21 Jul
**Morning**  
- **Explore Bangkok Old Town**  
  Wander through historic neighborhoods, visit local food stalls.  
  [More info here](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bangkok)

**Afternoon**  
- Leisure time in the area.

**Evening**  
- Dinner at a traditional Thai restaurant.

---

### Day 6 – Tuesday 22 Jul
**Morning**  
- Day at leisure. Option to revisit favorite spots or relax at the Airbnb.

**Afternoon**  
- Optional cooking class or spa treatment.

**Evening**  
- Dinner at a restaurant of your choice.

---

### Day 7 – Wednesday 23 Jul
**Morning**  
- Free morning for last-minute shopping or exploring.

**Afternoon**  
- Final lunch in Bangkok.

**Evening**  
- **Check-out Airbnb**   
  Head to the airport for your departure.
